author: Lisa Finlayson

review: I really like the versatility of the Chromecast. I like most of the apps that you can use with it. I really like how you can watch something on your tablet, cast it to the Chromecast and keep watching it and then if you need to leave you can pull it back to your tablet.I got this mostly for utlizing my Plex installation that I have and it has been working great. The biggest annoyance I have with the way the Chromecast works is that when I am watching a show and the kids start running in the room and want to ask me a question I have to fumble for my phone, open up the app and then pause whatever I am watching. I don't have the ability to just pick up the remote and press pause, which would be much faster. This is where a roku actually has a benefit over the Chromecast. With that said I can't stand the UI of the Roku so it is a tradeoff I am willing to make.
